m_szDocTitle: Honda's hydrogen fuel cell sedan can power your entire house
m_szDocSumamry: Honda's hydrogen fuel cell sedan can power your entire house 7.4k Honda Clarity Fuel Cell will go 434 miles on a single tank of hydrogen. Image:  Honda 2015-10-27 22:25:09 UTC Honda unveiled its first production hydrogen-powered fuel cell sedan, the Clarity Fuel Cell, at the Tokyo Motor Show on Tuesday. Though Honda has dabbled in hydrogen power since the late 1980s, the five-passenger Clarity Fuel Cell sedan is the first hydrogen-powered model that the Japanese carmaker has intended to offer up to the public. See also: Construction of $150 million hyperloop test track beginning in weeks Image
